short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects data from Amazon Relay -> Tours -> History page and summarize it by drivers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use the extention after adding in Google Chrome open Developer Tools from top right menu or simply use keyboard shortcut - Command + Option + I (macOS) or F12 or Control + Shift + I (Windows and Linux). Then choose tab - loadFlof | amazon relay (see video in description).

THE EXTENSION collects and analyzes data from Amazon Relay Tours History page. It effectively captures information such as number of tours, paid amount, distances traveled, and overall performance metrics.

Once the data is collected, the extension generates a concise and user-friendly summary for drivers. This summary includes key insights and important statistics.

The extension not only simplifies data collection but also enhances productivity by presenting the information in a clear and organized manner.
